Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, fabric is grey in section, interior partially covered with an off-white deposit, exterior covered with a thin cream-coloured slip and with very faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393174) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393174)
